sentences.sContent: He has on his jeans and a long-sleeved blue denim shirt with a white T-shirt underneath.
sentences.sCn: 他身穿牛仔裤和一件蓝色长袖粗斜纹棉布衬衫，里面还有件白色T恤衫。

sentences.sContent: The shooting-range is lit from underneath by rows of ruby-red light fixtures.
sentences.sCn: 射击场被一排排宝石红照明装置从下面照亮。

trans.tranOther: directly under another object or covered by it
